text:
it is not working, am i miss something ??
```{% set tag_posts = blog_recent_tag_posts(group.id, content.tag_list, 3) %}```
but this is working with only one tag
```{% set tag_posts = blog_recent_tag_posts(group.id, content.tag_list[0].slug, 3) %}```

Hello HubSpot Community,
is there a way to export Hubl Template Code for modules directly from page builder? Would be great!

Thanks in advance.

The HubL template code can be found in the Design Manager, by fetching using the CLI or by using the APIs.

Aside from HubL within content regions of the page such as a rich text field, you will not be able to pull it from that screen.

Hell HubSpot Community
Is there a way to make an if statement with Hubl in order to show/hide something if current contact.email is known?
i think it's not possible because that variable is slow to appear... but maybe there are other ways..
Do you mean in a page or email or?
sorry, in the template of my blog post
